EmailTemplate.description: Notify the Contact when a new record is created.
EmailTemplate.name: Contact Notification
EmailTemplate.subject: Your Contact Details have been stored in TechnologyOne CRM System
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Just sending a quick follow up email to inform you that your contact details have been stored in our CRM system.
Your contact details may include full name, email address, contact phone number, company information and role details. These details are kept on file to ensure we are able to serve you in the best possible way in the future. All information is stored securely and according to current privacy laws and regulations.
If you have any questions or objections to this, please let me know by replying to this email. Below is a link to our privacy policy if you require any further information.
Privacy Policy: https://technologyonecorp.com/privacy-policy
Regards
{!User.Name} {!User.Title}
